A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It did not respect Star Wars Lore and Luke's character.  Lot's of plot holes.  Why all this war in episode VII to find Luke's map if he don't want to be found!?  What's the point of Anakin being born directly from the force if anyone in the galaxy can have it freely...??We don't want moral lesson in star wars\, Just courageous fearless heroes in lightsabers duel.
